about_the_game:
AREA 19 is a psychological first person horror game. Find yourself In a top-secret underground facility where you will have to discover the horrifying aftermath of an operation gone wrong... Horribly Wrong


Discover horrifying Alien hybrid experiments as you traverse the Facility. Who created these monsters? Why?


Unravel the complex web of secrecy and conspiracy that shrouds each corner. What hidden agendas are at play, and what consequences await those who dare to expose the truth?


Area 19 is told through a Linear Story Mode. Travel through the Six levels and uncover the mysteries that shroud this forgotten place...

content_descriptors.notes: In Area 19, You traverse through an abandoned government laboratory where the staff have been killed by Aliens. There is Blood on the walls and frequent corpses laying on the ground as you progress through the story. There are no depictions of suicide in Area 19.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey/Catalina
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X 4 GB Intel UHD Graphics 630 1536 MB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey or Later
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X 4 GB Intel UHD Graphics 630 1536 MB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default

name: Area 19

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7500U CPU @ 2.70GHz 2.90 GHz
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 620
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel(R) Display Audio
  • Additional Notes: Developed on a low end PC. So If you have a good PC your golden

short_description: A First Person Sci Fi Horror Game. Set within a confidential Underground Facility, Navigate through this Abandoned Complex, Discover Government Experiments, Alien Beings, and the haunting aftermath of the Roswell Crash.
